languages.text: "Сообщение, что ее главный грязный секретик — теперь наш грязный секретик. Она первая побывала на Эпитафии и нашла тут кое-что... Слишком классное даже для ее статуса. Вольным Торговцам не положено владеть такими игрушками, и я сдала Лорд-инквизитору точнейшие координаты до последней цифры после запятой".

"Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."
languages.original_text: "Сообщение, что ее главный грязный секретик — теперь наш грязный секретик. Она первая побывала на Эпитафии и нашла тут кое-что... Слишком классное даже для ее статуса. Вольным Торговцам не положено владеть такими игрушками, и я сдала Лорд-инквизитору точнейшие координаты до последней цифры после запятой".

traits.locale_text: "I revealed her most dirty secret to Calcazar. She had been the first to visit Epitaph and found something way too good even for her status on here... The Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates up to the last digit after the decimal point to the Lord Inquisitor."

"I revealed her most dirty secret to Calcazar. She had been the first to visit Epitaph and found something way too good even for her status on here... The Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates up to the last digit after the decimal point to the Lord Inquisitor."

"I revealed her dirtiest secret to Calcazar. She was the first to visit Epitaph and found something way too good even for her status here... The Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates down to the last digit after the decimal to Lord Inquisitor."

"I revealed her dirtiest secret to Calcazar. She was the first to visit Epitaph and found something way too good even for her status here... The Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates down to the last digit after the decimal to Lord Inquisitor."

"Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

"Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

languages.text: « Simplement un message indiquant que son plus sombre secret était désormais notre plus sombre secret. Elle a été la première à se rendre sur Épitaphe et elle y a trouvé quelque chose... quelque chose de bien trop exceptionnel, même pour une femme de son rang... Les libres-marchands ne sont pas autorisés à avoir de tels jouets, alors j'en ai communiqué les coordonnées exactes, à la décimale près, au seigneur inquisiteur. »
languages.original_text: "Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai révélé son plus sombre secret à Calcazar. Elle a été la première à se rendre sur Épitaphe et elle y a trouvé quelque chose de bien trop exceptionnel, même pour une femme de son rang... Les libres-marchands ne sont pas autorisés à avoir de tels jouets, alors j'en ai communiqué les coordonnées exactes, à la décimale près, au seigneur inquisiteur. »

languages.text: «Solo le di un mensaje diciendo que su secreto era ahora nuestro secreto. Fue la primera en visitar Epitafio, y se topó con algo que le venía grande a incluso alguien de su estatus... A los Comerciantes Independientes no se les permite tener estos juguetitos y, por eso, facilité al Lord Inquisidor las coordenadas exactas, hasta la coma decimal».
languages.original_text: "Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: «Revelé su mayor secreto a Calcazar. Como fue la primera en visitar Epitafio, se topó con algo que le venía grande a incluso alguien de su estatus... A los Comerciantes Independientes no se les permite tener estos juguetitos y, por eso, facilité al Lord Inquisidor las coordenadas exactas, dígito a dígito».

languages.text: “我仅仅是传达了一条消息，说我们对她那些最肮脏的秘密了如指掌。她是第一个造访荒垄碑碣的人，还发现了某些过于贵重的宝物……就算是对她这样的人而言也过于贵重。像行商浪人这样的人，无权得到那样的玩具。于是，我把荒垄碑碣的精确坐标发给了大审判官，精确到了最后一位小数。”
languages.original_text: "Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: “我向卡尔卡扎透露了她最肮脏的秘密。她是第一个造访荒垄碑碣的人，还发现了某些过于贵重的宝物，就算是对她这样的人而言也过于贵重……像行商浪人这样的人，无权得到那样的玩具。于是，我把荒垄碑碣的精确坐标发给了审判长，精确到了最后一位小数。”

languages.text: 「彼女の汚れた秘密は、今や我々の汚れた秘密になったというメッセージってだけさ。彼女はエピタフを訪れた最初の人物で、ここで何かを見つけた…彼女のように高い身分を持つ者にとっても、あまりに素晴らしすぎるものをね。自由開拓者はそのようなオモチャを持つことを許されていない。私はロード・インクィジターに、小数点以下の下一桁までの正確な座標を伝えた」
languages.original_text: "Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の汚れた秘密は、今や我々の汚れた秘密になったというメッセージってだけさ。彼女はエピタフを訪れた最初の人物で、ここで何かを見つけた…彼女のように高い身分を持つ者にとっても、あまりに素晴らしすぎるものをね。自由開拓者はそのようなオモチャを持つことを許されていない。私はロード・インクィジターに、小数点以下の下一桁までの正確な座標を伝えた」

languages.text: "Lediglich eine Botschaft, dass ihr schmutziges Geheimnis nun unser schmutziges Geheimnis ist. Sie hat Epitaph als Erste besucht und hier etwas gefunden. Etwas, was selbst für jemanden von ihrem erhabenen Status zu gut war. Es ist Freihändlern nicht gestattet, solche Spielzeuge zu haben, und ich habe dem Großinquisitor die exakten Daten übermittelt, bis zur letzten Nachkommastelle."
languages.original_text: "Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Calcazar ihr schmutzigstes Geheimnis verraten. Sie hat Epitaph als Erste besucht und hier etwas gefunden, was selbst für ihren Status viel zu gut war ... Es ist den Freihändlern nicht gestattet, solche Spielzeuge zu haben, und ich habe dem Großinquisitor die exakten Daten übermittelt, bis zur letzten Stelle."

languages.text: "Kirli sırrının artık bizim kirli sırrımız olduğunu söyleyen bir mesajdı sadece. Sinyazıt'a ilk o gelmiş ve burada bir şey bulmuştu. Bulduğu şey, onun gibi haşmetli biri için bile fazla iyiydi. Hür Tacirler böyle oyuncaklara sahip olamaz. Koordinatları, ondalık noktasından sonraki son sayıya kadar eksiksiz olarak Lord Engizisyoncu'ya ilettim."
languages.original_text: "Merely a message saying that her dirty secret was now our dirty secret. She was the first to visit Epitaph, and she found something here... something too good even for someone of her exalted status. Rogue Traders are not allowed to have such toys, and I relayed the most exact coordinates, down to the last digit after the decimal point, to the Lord Inquisitor."
